title: did not receive a response from server
body: Any ideea ? I tryed all metodes on youtube and lol forum and didnt work ....

replies.body:
Hey Cuart,

There are a few things that can stop you from receiving a response from the server. I'd like you to try these steps to resolve this:

1. Open Internet Explorer

2. Select 'Internet Options'

3. Navigate to the 'Advanced tab'

4. Scroll down in the window to the security section

5. Uncheck the boxes to disable SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0

6. Check the boxes to enable TLS 1.0

7. Hit Apply

8. Restart League of Legends

If this doesn't allow you to connect to the server, please submit a support ticket [here!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Thank you very much!! Thank you, thank you, thank youuuuu!!! I love you! <3
THIS WORKS 100%
Two years later and it still works! Glad to hear it!

Ok guys, guess we can this this as best necro ever?

Here a sausage as a prize.
